name: BarKeep
description:
Keep all customers happy by serving their desired drink, you will need to learn and memorize each recipe as you meet new customers, each recipe will comprise of a single type of yeast, multiple types of malt and hops

Controls:

  • Mouse is required to navigate the menus

Looking at the beer pump clip, look up the recipe in the recipes tab, and match the ingredients in your brew.

Once you have brewed a beer, you can serve as many customers as you want.

The game is lost if a customer leaves unhappy.
